abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid33247138, pmid33219926, pmid33225382, pmid33211678, pmid33217030, pmid33263514, pmid33237893, pmid33082295, pmid33219042, pmid33219827
